org.datavec.nlp.tokenization.tokenizerfactory

Interface TokenizerFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTokenizerFactory, PosUimaTokenizerFactory, UimaTokenizerFactory

    public interface TokenizerFactory
    Generates a tokenizer for a given string
